title: Save On Thousands Of PC Games And Unlock Free Steam Keys During Fanatical's Lunar New Year Sale
description: Fanatical is celebrating the start of the Year of the Snake with its annual Lunar New Year Sale. The sale runs until February 2, and not only are thousands of PC games on sale, the retailer is also throwing in bonus coupons and free games as part of the event. See All Lunar New Year Deals at Fanatical Some big, noteworthy discounts in Fanatical Lunar New Year Sale iinclude Crusader Kings III for $13.74 (was $50), Total Warhammer III for 21.69 (was $60), and Middle-earth: Shadow of War - Definitive Edition for $5 (was $60). You can also pick up most of the games in the Steam World series for less than $2 each, including Steam World Dig, Steam World Dig 2, Steam World Heist, and Steam World Quest. The latest entry in the franchise, Stream World Heist 2, is on sale for $12.89 (was $30).Continue Reading at GameSpot
excerpt: Here's a look at some of the hundreds of games and bonus deals available during the Fanatical Lunar New Year Sale.
text: GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links. Fanatical is celebrating the start of the Year of the Snake with its annual Lunar New Year Sale. The sale runs until February 2, and not only are thousands of PC games on sale, the retailer is also throwing in bonus coupons and free games as part of the event.Some big, noteworthy discounts in Fanatical Lunar New Year Sale iinclude Crusader Kings III for $13.74 (was $50), Total Warhammer III for 21.69 (was $60), and Middle-earth: Shadow of War - Definitive Edition for $5 (was $60). You can also pick up most of the games in the Steam World series for less than $2 each, including Steam World Dig, Steam World Dig 2, Steam World Heist, and Steam World Quest. The latest entry in the franchise, Stream World Heist 2, is on sale for $12.89 (was $30).You can also grab recent releases at some of their best discounts yet, including GameSpot's 2024 Game of the Year, Metaphor: ReFantazio, for $46.19 (was $70), Warhammer 40K: Space Marine 2 for $43.19 (was $60), and Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth for $31.49 (was $70). 2024 was packed with great games, including December releases you may have missed out on and are worth grabbing while they're on sale, including Indiana Jones and the Great Circle for $58 (was $70) and Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver 1 & 2 Remastered for $22.49 (was $30).Bethesda-published games like Skyrim, Fallout 4, and Doom Eternal are often included in Fanatical's sales, and the Lunar New Year Sale is no different. However, this is one of the best chances to grab the studio's latest release, Starfield, at a nice disount along with its new Shattered Space DLC story expansion thanks to the Starfield Premium Edition being just $57 (was $100) during the sale. This version also includes a digital artbook, soundtrack, and extra in-game cosmetic items. Be sure to browse the deals from other big publishers like Capcom, Sega, 2K, Rockstar, Warner Bos., and more. We've also rounded up a long list of our favorite deals in the sale below.Saving on PC games is only part of the draw of Fanatical's Lunar New Year Sale. The retailer is also holding a special promotion throughout the event that gets you a free Bonus Envelope containing extra coupons or mystery game keys for every order of $15 or more. The many disocunted games in the sale are elligible for the Bonus Envelope deal, as are Fanatical's numerous build-your-own-bundle deals that include big batches of games at super low prices. Some noteworthy bundles to check out include the Monster Hunter Bundle, Winter Mystery Bundle, Elite VR Bundle, and Slayer Bundle. Be sure to browse all the bundle deals at Fanatical to see what's available.Note that all games purchased at Fanatical are delivered as official keys. Most are Steam Keys, but other launchers like the Epic Game Store are also included. html:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Fanatical is celebrating the start of the Year of the Snake with its annual Lunar New Year Sale. The sale runs until February 2, and not only are thousands of PC games on sale, the retailer is also throwing in bonus coupons and free games as part of the event.

Some big, noteworthy discounts in Fanatical Lunar New Year Sale iinclude Crusader Kings III for $13.74 (was $50), Total Warhammer III for 21.69 (was $60), and Middle-earth: Shadow of War - Definitive Edition for $5 (was $60). You can also pick up most of the games in the Steam World series for less than $2 each, including Steam World Dig, Steam World Dig 2, Steam World Heist, and Steam World Quest. The latest entry in the franchise, Stream World Heist 2, is on sale for $12.89 (was $30).

You can also grab recent releases at some of their best discounts yet, including GameSpot's 2024 Game of the Year, Metaphor: ReFantazio, for $46.19 (was $70), Warhammer 40K: Space Marine 2 for $43.19 (was $60), and Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth for $31.49 (was $70). 2024 was packed with great games, including December releases you may have missed out on and are worth grabbing while they're on sale, including Indiana Jones and the Great Circle for $58 (was $70) and Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver 1 & 2 Remastered for $22.49 (was $30).

Bethesda-published games like Skyrim, Fallout 4, and Doom Eternal are often included in Fanatical's sales, and the Lunar New Year Sale is no different. However, this is one of the best chances to grab the studio's latest release, Starfield, at a nice disount along with its new Shattered Space DLC story expansion thanks to the Starfield Premium Edition being just $57 (was $100) during the sale. This version also includes a digital artbook, soundtrack, and extra in-game cosmetic items. Be sure to browse the deals from other big publishers like Capcom, Sega, 2K, Rockstar, Warner Bos., and more. We've also rounded up a long list of our favorite deals in the sale below.

Saving on PC games is only part of the draw of Fanatical's Lunar New Year Sale. The retailer is also holding a special promotion throughout the event that gets you a free Bonus Envelope containing extra coupons or mystery game keys for every order of $15 or more. The many disocunted games in the sale are elligible for the Bonus Envelope deal, as are Fanatical's numerous build-your-own-bundle deals that include big batches of games at super low prices. Some noteworthy bundles to check out include the Monster Hunter Bundle, Winter Mystery Bundle, Elite VR Bundle, and Slayer Bundle. Be sure to browse all the bundle deals at Fanatical to see what's available.

Note that all games purchased at Fanatical are delivered as official keys. Most are Steam Keys, but other launchers like the Epic Game Store are also included. Each game's page lists which store the key is for.

Disclosure: GameSpot and Fanatical are both owned by Fandom.
